trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If Buster the Bear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.
